    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"

>
[Performative Weapons Training](/Feats.aspx?ID=1980) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 175 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Gladiator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=61)

**Prerequisites**
[Gladiator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1976)

</column>

---

You're skilled with flashy weapons. You are trained with the [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [dueling cape](/Equipment.aspx?ID=680), [spiked chain](/Weapons.aspx?ID=60), [sword cane](/Weapons.aspx?ID=127), and [whip](/Weapons.aspx?ID=48). Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in the weapons listed.
name: Performative Weapons Training
